item.title: Meme Token Tokabu Surpasses $60 Million Market Cap, 24-hour Gain of 71.32%
item.description: August 11th. According to GMGN data, the Solana-based Meme token Tokabu (The Spirit of Gambling) has a market capitalization exceeding $60 million. It has a 24-hour gain of 71.32% and a 24-hour trading volume of $11.9 million. Tokabu (The Spirit of Gambling) emphasizes the Meme token gambler spirit and caters to the high volatility and quick returns of the crypto market. BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins often lack practical use cases and experience significant price volatility, so investment should be approached with caution.

item.title: Nvidia's Response to "AI Chip Import Tariffs": Complying with the rules set by the U.S. government to participate in the global market
item.description: August 11th: In reaction to the market rumor that "NVIDIA and AMD have reached an agreement to allocate 15% of their AI chip sales revenue in the Chinese market to the U.S. government," NVIDIA responded by indicating that it adheres to the rules established by the U.S. government in order to participate in the global market. The demand for accelerated computing is of a global nature, and NVIDIA will continue to serve as many customers as possible within the framework of these rules. Up to now, AMD has not provided a response. (Caixin)

item.title: Analyst: Bitcoin Options Market Shows Bullish Sentiment at Near-Monthly High
item.description: On August 11th, the CryptoQuant analyst Axel Adler Jr. put out that the bullish sentiment in the Bitcoin options market has gone up to the highest level in the past month.

item.title: A certain whale withdrew 5627 ETH from HTX after 5 months of dormancy, worth approximately $24.34 million
item.description: On August 11th, as per the monitoring of OnchainLens, a whale that had been dormant for 5 months withdrew 5627 ETH from HTX. The value of this withdrawal is approximately $24.34 million. Subsequently, the whale staked the ETH with Everstake.

item.title: Strategy's First Bitcoin Purchase Anniversary: Market Value Surges Over 78x
item.description: On August 11th, Strategy (formerly MicroStrategy) made its inaugural Bitcoin purchase. Specifically, on August 11, 2020, Strategy spent $250 million to acquire 21,454 Bitcoins, with an average price of approximately $11,652. This signified MicroStrategy's initial step of holding Bitcoin as part of its reserve assets, making it the first publicly traded company with a Bitcoin treasury reserve strategy.In 2020, on August 11th, MicroStrategy had a market capitalization of approximately $1.436 billion. Currently, the market capitalization of Strategy (MSTR) is $112.04 billion, representing a more than 78-fold increase. Strategy (MSTR) currently holds 628,791 BTC, which is valued at $76.704 billion. The average holding price is $73,207.87, and the unrealized gain is approximately $30.6 billion.

item.title: Ant Group Denies Rumors of Rare Earth RMB Stablecoin: Never Had Such a Plan with Any Relevant Institution
item.description: August 11th. Ant Group issued an announcement stating that there were online rumors suggesting that "Ant Group, the People's Bank of China, and China Rare Earth Group are jointly establishing the world's first rare-earth-backed RMB stablecoin." The announcement cautioned investors to pay attention to this sector. Ant Group has never had such a plan in conjunction with relevant institutions. The public is advised to be cautious and be on guard against scams.

item.title: An Ethereum ICO Whale Sells 2300 ETH, Valued at $9.91 Million
item.description: On August 11th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, a whale from a particular Ethereum ICO that obtained 20,000 ETH sold 2,300 ETH 20 minutes ago. The value of these sold ETH is 9.91 million US dollars, and it still holds 1,623 ETH with a value of 6.99 million US dollars.The total cost of their ICO was $6,200, and currently, these ETH are worth $86.6 million.

item.title: A whale has deposited 6 million USDC into Hyperliquid to avoid BTC short liquidation.
item.description: On August 11th, based on the monitoring of LookOnChain, a whale deposited 6 million USDC as collateral to Hyperliquid in order to avoid liquidation.The address currently holds a short position of 1266.84 BTC, which is worth about $154 million. The liquidation price is $127,780, resulting in a loss of approximately $12.5 million.

item.title: Analysis: BTC On-Chain Structure Returns to $117k Support Range, First Rebound Target is $125k
item.description: August 11th. On-chain data analyst Murphy posted that BTC has reverted to $120,000. Although it can't be regarded as a successful hold for the time being, it can be confirmed that on the chip structure side, BTC has once again returned to the price range supported by $117,000, transforming the turnover zone from $112,000 to $116,000 into a "safe zone," which is almost in line with the price trajectory deduced based on the "double-anchor structure."Looking at the "MVRV Extreme Deviation Pricing Range," BTC is currently still operating between the channel formed by the orange and yellow lines. It may find support at the lower rail and encounter resistance at the upper rail. The current upper rail position of the operating channel is $125,000, which is also the first target of the rebound within the channel. If it successfully breaks through and does not fall back below on a pullback, it is most likely to move up another range to the second target of $137,000. If it meets resistance, it

item.title: The US convenience store chain Sheetz has announced that it will accept Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies as payment
item.description: On August 11th, according to Deepnewz, the U.S. convenience store chain brand Sheetz announced that it will commence accepting Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies as a form of payment. Additionally, it will provide a 50% discount to customers who make purchases using cryptocurrency on a daily basis. Sheetz is a chain brand with a valuation of $6.2 billion and has 700 stores spread across the United States.Previously, on May 16th, the chain fast-food brand Steak 'n Shake started accepting Bitcoin payments at all its U.S. stores. Its Chief Operating Officer stated that after implementing Bitcoin payments, same-store sales in the second quarter witnessed an increase of 10.7%, and Bitcoin has become a "game changer."
